<robot name="inmoov">

  <!-- ABS is 1.04g per 1.0cm^3 -->
  <!-- PLA is 1.25g per 1.0cm^3 -->
  <material name="Blue">
    <color rgba="0.0 0.0 0.8 1.0"/>
  </material>
  <material name="Green">
    <color rgba="0.0 0.8 0.0 1.0"/>

  </material>

    <color rgba="0.8 0.0 0.0 1.0"/>

    <color rgba="1.0 1.0 1.0 1.0"/>

    <axis xyz="0 -1.0 0"/>
    <limit effort="10" lower="-1.0471975512" upper="1.0471975512" velocity="20.0"/>
    <dynamics damping="0.1"/>
  </joint>

        <alwaysOn>true</alwaysOn>
        <frameName>_ffdistal</frameName>
        <updateRate>100.0</updateRate>
        <bumperTopicName>contacts/_ff/distal</bumperTopicName>
      </plugin>
    </sensor>
    <mu1 value="500.0"/>
    <mu2 value="500.0"/>
    <kp value="10000000.0"/>
    <kd value="1.0"/>
    <selfCollide>true</selfCollide>
  </gazebo>

    <inertial>
      <origin rpy="0 0 0" xyz="0 0 0"/>
      <mass value="0.008"/>
      <inertia ixx="0.00000026" ixy="0.0" ixz="0.0" iyy="0.00000026" iyz="0.0" izz="0.00000032"/>

    <child link="_mfknuckle"/>

    <inertial>
      <mass value="0.001"/>
      <inertia ixx="0.0" ixy="0.0" ixz="0.0" iyy="0.0" iyz="0.0" izz="0.0"/>
    </inertial>
  </link>
  <joint name="_thtip" type="fixed">
    <parent link="_thdistal"/>
    <child link="_thtip"/>
    <origin rpy="0 0 0" xyz="0 0 0.0275"/>
  </joint>
  <!-- prefix can be anything but usually is "" or  "" for right and left hands distinction -->
  <gazebo reference="_thdistal">
    <sensor name="_thdistacontact" type="contact">
      <always_on>1</always_on>
      <update_rate>1000.0</update_rate>
      <contact>
        <collision>_thdistacollision</collision>
        <topic>_thdistacollision</topic>
      </contact>
      <plugin filename="libgazebo_ros_bumper.so" name="_thdistagazebo_ros_bumpecontroller">
        <alwaysOn>true</alwaysOn>
        <frameName>_thdistal</frameName>
        <updateRate>100.0</updateRate>
        <bumperTopicName>contacts/_th/distal</bumperTopicName>
      </plugin>
    </sensor>
    <mu1 value="500.0"/>
    <mu2 value="500.0"/>
    <kp value="10000000.0"/>
    <kd value="1.0"/>
    <selfCollide>true</selfCollide>
  </gazebo>
  <transmission name="_thdistatransmission">
    <type>smechanism_model/SimpleTransmission</type>
    <actuator name="_THJ1">
      <mechanicalReduction>1</mechanicalReduction>
    </actuator>
    <joint name="_THJ1">
      <hardwareInterface>EffortJointInterface</hardwareInterface>
      <hardwareInterface>PositionJointInterface</hardwareInterface>
    </joint>
  </transmission>
</robot>
